Cougaar 12.7
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat

Class Summary
AuthValve A Valve for Tomcat 4.0 that will use org.cougaar.core.security.acl.auth.DualAuthenticator if it exists and the System property org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat.enableAuth is "true".
EmbeddedTomcat This class wraps the org.apache.catalina.startup.Catalina class to follow similar behavior as Tomcat 3.3's EmbededTomcat class.
ErrorServlet A simple error servlet for PAGE-NOT-FOUND messages.
HookServlet Servlet that is loaded by both TomcatServletEngine and Tomcat itself -- this is used to delegate requests within Tomcat back into the (launching) TomcatServletEngine's "gateway" Servlet.
HookServletFront This class is designed to load org.cougaar.core.security.acl.auth.SecureHookServlet if it exists and the System property org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat.enableAuth is "true".
SecureContext A Tomcat Context which will inform the security services of its creation if the security services exist and the System property org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat.enableAuth is "true".
SecureRealm A Realm extension for Tomcat 4.0 that will use org.cougaar.core.security.crypto.ldap.KeyRingJNDIRealm if it exists and the System property org.cougaar.lib.web.tomcat.enableAuth is "true".
TomcatServletEngine This component is a Tomcat 4.0.3 -based implementation of the ServletEngineService.
